list.a: Visit our Donate page and follow the simple steps to make your contribution.
Yes, AFGHANIUM is a registered charity and all donations are tax-deductible.

list.q: How can I track my donation?
list.a: Use your unique donation ID on the Track Donation page to see where your funds are being used.

list.q: What payment methods do you accept?
list.a: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, cryptocurrency, and bank transfers.

list.q: How do I know my donation is being used properly?
list.a: We provide full transparency through our tracking system and impact proofs showing exactly how funds are used.
